alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Dallas; Lowndes; Perry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 5:40PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Autauga, east central Perry, northwestern Lowndes and northeastern Dallas Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 540 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Potter Station to near Benton. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Selma, Valley Grande, Selmont-West Selmont, Autaugaville, White Hall, Benton, Mulberry, Gardner Island, Paul M Grist State Park, Tyler, Memorial Stadium, Burnsville, Potter Station, Robert F. Henry Lock And Dam, Summerfield, Valley Creek Junction, Plantersville, Selma Drag Strip, Suttle and Edmund Pettus Bridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
